forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 17 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph.

forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Rain Showers

forecast.name: Saturday Night

forecast.name: This Afternoon

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
